name: Accounts Receivable
description: Amounts owed by clients for completed work

name: Retainage Receivable
description: Retainage held by clients pending project completion

name: Prepaid Expenses
description: Insurance premiums and deposits paid in advance

name: Short-Term Investments
description: Money market and CD holdings under 12 months

name: Accounts Payable
description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors

name: Accrued Payroll
description: Wages and salaries earned but not yet paid

name: Accrued Taxes
description: Payroll taxes and income taxes payable

name: Short-Term Loans
description: Line of credit and short-term borrowings

name: Retained Earnings
description: Accumulated net income from prior years

name: Direct Labor
description: Wages for field workers and tradespeople

name: Temporary Facilities
description: Job trailers temp power and fencing

name: Travel & Entertainment
description: Business travel meals and client entertainment

name: Technology & Software
description: Software licenses IT services and hardware

name: Interest Expense
description: Interest on loans and credit lines

name: Loss on Asset Disposal
description: Losses from equipment and asset sales
